item.title: Piano Teacher, record 200+ scales, chords, and arpeggios for practice app - Upwork
item.description:
I'm preparing to create a gamified educational app (for music) similar to Duolingo (for language). The app is intended to be a daily practice aid, drilling students on rhythm, theory, ear training, etc. I need someone to record videos of piano scales, chords, and arpeggios, for students to practice along with. There needs to be a metronome click sound (for all my erratic students, lol).

The candidate needs a strong understanding of piano technique.  Ideally you will also have an understanding of piano pedagogy. I have already set out a framework (see linked sheet and attached Technical Exercises) for what needs to be recorded, but I am open to adjustments, especially on the suggested tempi (each exercise will need to be recorded at multiple tempi). Skills in post production would be a plus.

Sound and visuals need to be of high quality. I want an overhead view of the hands, like the attached image.

Price is negotiable.

I'm excited to be moving one step closer to my dream of helping my piano students (and everyone) become fluent performers!

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1lA1HoYedlOxwsRVlwA8BTSkbMQnBOCKgWBrpNmiwF_g/edit?usp=sharing

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 17, 2024 00:54 UTC
Category: Music Performance
Skills:Piano, Music Production, Videography, Audio Recording
Skills: Piano, Music Production, Videography, Audio Recording
Country: USA
click to apply

item.title: Full-time Video Editor for Instagram Reels and TikTok Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and creative video editor who specialises in creating engaging and eye-catching Instagram Reels and TikTok videos.

As a full-time video editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing various types of content, including products, podcasts, reviews, and restaurant videos.

The ideal candidate must have a solid understanding of the latest trends and features of both platforms to create captivating videos that resonate with our target audience.

Skills required:
- Proficient in video editing software - Preferably Premiere Pro
- Strong knowledge of Instagram Reels and TikTok video editing techniques
- Ability to tell compelling stories through editing
- Attention to detail and strong organisational skills
- Excellent communication and collaboration abilities

We are looking for an intermediate level expert who can work closely with our team to create visually appealing videos that align with our brand identity.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 00:35 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: Australia

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for a video editor to work on multiple video projects each month crafting final videos for our clients at FLVR Creative.

FLVR is a creative agency specialising in timeless photo and video content for brands we love. At the moment, we mainly work with clients in the construction industry for their social media content, with the occasional hospitality or lifestyle brand.

You can check out our work via social media at https://www.instagram.com/flvrcreative/

You will be required to turn RAW C-Log footage and turn it into an engaging video based on our detailed brief that we provide. We also are always open to your creativity and love to see what ideas you can come up with for our work. Our ideal turn around times for our projects are 1-3 days, so we require someone who has a strong ability to confidently deliver in this fast paced environment at all times.

You must have experience with Adobe Premiere Pro or DaVinci Resolve to be considered for this role. Please feel free to attach your showreel/previous work to your application.

Look forward to hearing from you!

Hourly Range: $5.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 00:32 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Corporate Video, Film, Real Estate Video, Promotional Video, Color Grading, Audio Editing, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Corporate Video, Film, Real Estate Video, Promotional Video, Color Grading, Audio Editing, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Media Curator - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented YouTube Media Curator to join our team and be responsible for managing and curating content for our YouTube channels. As a YouTube Media Curator, your main role will be sourcing, selecting, and organizing videos for our editor. This includes staying updated with the latest trends, topics, and viral videos to ensure our channels remain relevant and engaging. The ideal candidate should have a deep understanding of YouTube's content guidelines and best practices.

    Responsibilities:
    - Source, select, and organize videos for YouTube channels
    - Stay updated with the latest trends, topics, and viral videos
    - Ensure adherence to YouTube's content guidelines and best practices

    Requirements:
    - Proven experience as a YouTube Media Curator or similar role
    - Strong knowledge of YouTube's content guidelines and best practices
    - Excellent organizational and time management skills
    - Attention to detail and the ability to curate high-quality content

    If you are passionate about YouTube and have a talent for finding and curating captivating videos, we would love to hear from you. This is a great opportunity to join a growing team and make a significant impact on our YouTube channels.

Hourly Range: $8.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 00:08 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:YouTube Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, YouTube, Content Strategy
Skills: YouTube Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, YouTube, Content Strategy
Country: United States

item.title: Creative Content Strategist for TikTok - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

We are looking for a creative and innovative content strategist to develop engaging TikTok video ideas. We need someone who understands current trends, can think outside the box, and can help us connect with our audience in a fun and meaningful way.

Responsibilities:

Generate fresh and exciting ideas for TikTok videos that align with our brand's values and target audience.
Research and stay up-to-date with TikTok trends to ensure our content remains relevant.
Develop content plans and calendars to maintain a consistent posting schedule.
Collaborate with our marketing team to ensure content aligns with our overall strategy.
Provide script ideas and storyboards for video production.

Requirements:

Proven experience in creating successful TikTok content.
Strong understanding of TikTok trends and algorithms.
Creative mindset with the ability to generate unique and engaging ideas.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Experience in content strategy and planning.
Ability to meet deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

Preferred Qualifications:

Background in social media marketing or digital content creation.
Familiarity with video editing tools and techniques.
Passion for our brand and products.

To Apply:
Please submit your resume, a portfolio of your previous TikTok work, and a brief description of your approach to creating engaging TikTok content.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$54.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 00:04 UTC
Category: Content Strategy
Skills:Content Strategy
Skills: Content Strategy
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: 360 Degree Video Editing Jewelry Ring - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced video editor to enhance our 360° videos of jewelry rings, which were filmed on a turntable in a whitebox. The goal is to center each video, improve the graphics quality, and overall enhance the videos.

Requirements:
- Center each video.
- Improve the graphics quality.
- Adjust the background so that the turntable and background appear as a seamless, uniform surface.

The attached sample video should only show the ring and the turntable, with the background removed or adjusted so that it matches the color of the turntable, creating a uniform appearance.

Since the turntable and background have different shades of white, it is essential to edit them so they visually match and appear as one consistent surface.

We currently have a total of twelve videos that need editing. I am going to send you one video to use as a sample when Inquiry.

Budget:
I have not set a fixed budget yet and would like to receive a price proposal.



Posted On: June 16, 2024 23:43 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, 3D Modeling, Video Production, Education, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, 3D Modeling, Video Production, Education, Video Post-Editing
Country: DEU

item.title: Music Performance Video Color Correction - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a skilled video editor to color correct our music performance videos. The selected candidate must have experience in enhancing the visual appeal of videos by adjusting colors and tones to create a cohesive and professional look. The videos showcase live music performances and it is important to maintain the authenticity of the original footage while enhancing its overall quality. The ideal candidate should be proficient in using video editing software and have a keen eye for detail. I have several videos that need editing. My hope is to hire someone to do a quick sample on a minute or two of footage to see if it's possible to improve what I already have. If yes, then I will hire you for the remainder of the work.

item.title: Video Editor for Sci-Fi Audiobook Series in Russian with AI-Generated Visuals: Battle of Earth - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a creative and skilled Video Editor to bring our Russian-translated audiobook, based on the Battlefield Earth book, to life in a visually captivating video series. This project involves transforming the audiobook into engaging episodes featuring thrilling alien encounters, futuristic landscapes, and epic adventures. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in video editing, with a knack for creating visually stunning and immersive experiences. Responsibilities include designing and integrating high-quality AI-generated visuals (including animations, alien designs, and space scenes), synchronizing audio with visuals, and ensuring each episode is polished and professional. Proficiency in video editing software, a passion for science fiction, and fluency in Russian are essential. Join us in creating an out-of-this-world experience for our audience!
https://margaritashalit.podbean.com/

Hourly Range: $11.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 23:23 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Post-Editing, Video Editing
